attributes.action: Ask the UK Government to urge the FA not to sell Wembley Stadium.
attributes.additional_details: This petition is backed by Harry Harris, well-known British football journalist and published author of many football books.
attributes.background: Wembley Stadium is the iconic home of English football. It should remain under the FA's ownership, to safeguard its freedom to be used primarily as the national stadium and for significant sporting events, including other sports. Selling to a private bidder simply risks far too unclear a future.
